meanings.definition: Extremely silly or funny in a crazy or bizarre way.
meanings.sent1: The clown's performance was the zaniest of all.
meanings.sent2: She always has the zaniest ideas for our group projects.
meanings.sent3: The zaniest thing happened when the cat started dancing with a hat on.
meanings.sent4: Her zaniest dreams were filled with flying elephants and talking trees.
meanings.sent5: The zaniest character in the story wore mismatched socks and a hat made of feathers.

meanings.definition: The most silly or eccentric in a group.
meanings.sent1: Among the comedians, he was known as the zaniest.
meanings.sent2: She won the award for being the zaniest in the class.
meanings.sent3: The zaniest member of the team always brought laughter to their meetings.
meanings.sent4: His jokes made him the zaniest person at the party.
meanings.sent5: The zaniest of the group had a contagious sense of humor.
